titleStmt.title: SII 7.460: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 460. (A.R. No. 246 of 1901). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevi vaḷar tiruppon mātu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalamperitu ciṟappa vijayamāmakaḷ velpu
yat tiruppa Icaiyin celviyu meṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar van=ti ṟaiñca nīṇilamaṭan=taiyait tirumaṇam puṇarntu
cīrvaḷar taruma maṇimuṭi kavittena maṇimuṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattu palluyiṟyiṟ kellām Ellaiyi linpa mikavini tey
ta veṇkuṭainiḻaṟ ceṅko locci vāḻi yūḻi yāḻi naṭappac cempon vīrasiṁhāsanattup puvanamuḻutuṭaiyā
ḷoṭum vīṟṟirun=taruḷiya korājakesaripaṟmarāna tiripuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevar
mā maṇṭapattu muttuppan=talinkiḻ paḷḷippiṭattu Eḻun=taruḷiyiru
n=tu tiruvāymoḻin=taruḷinapaṭi jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattuk kaḷattūrkkoṭṭattut taniyūr śrīmaturān=takaccaturvveti
maṅkalattu tiruvaicciṟupākkattu Āṭcikoṇṭamahādevaṟku munpu tevatānam Illaiyenṟu I
ttevaṟku veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka Āyirakkala nellukku Ōymānāṭāna vijaiyarājen=ti rava
ḷanāṭṭu neṟkunṟamāna cempiyancāttanūrum muṭiyampākkamum kaṭakavaṭṭiyum Innāṭṭu Arin=ta vancāttanūrenṟu kū
ṭina Ūrkaḷil ciṟukaṭuvanpākkamum vayalūril nāle kāṇik kiḻaraiye Irumāvaraiye Araikkāṇik kiḻaraiye Araimā mun=ti
rikai nilamum Ōkūrppāl puḷiyuṇṇiyum tevatānam Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭup paḻamper tavirttu munpu kāṇiyu
ṭaiya kāṇiyāḷaṟkey kāṇiyāy kalikaṭin=tacoḻancāttanūrennum perāl Ōrurākak kūṭṭappeṟaveṇṭume
nnu Ikkōyiliṟ piṭārar civalokamuṭaiyāraina kāṭṭi kulottuṅkacoḻabahmramārāyan namakkuc connamaiyi
l Iyāṇṭu munṟāvanumutal paḻamper tavirttut tevartānam Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu munpu kāṇiyuṭaiya kāṇiyāḷa
ṟcey kāṇiyāy kalikaṭin=ta coḻan cāttanūrennum perāl Ōrurākak kūṭṭik kuṭuppatu Ippaṭi tiruvāymoḻi
n=ta ruḷinār Ivai vicaiyarājan Eḻuttu Ivai kaṅkaikoṇṭacoḻakkaḷappāḷan Eḻuttu Ivai vayalnāṭṭaraiya
ṉattu mukaveṭṭi keṭuṅkunṟaṅkiḻān Eḻuttu Ivai puravaric ciykaraṇanāyaka
Digital edition of SII 7.460 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
